languages.text: "Не вмешивайся, чужа{mf|к|чка}. Этот человек должен понести наказание, как и вся прогнившая верхушка Тассеры. Люди для них — одеяния. Пусть взглянет мне в глаза и поймет, каково быть раскроенным на куски". {n}Вы замечаете, что прижатое к телу жертвы оружие — не что иное, как искусно заточенные портняжные ножницы.{/n}

"Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не вмешивайся, чужа{mf|к|чка}. Этот человек должен понести наказание, как и вся прогнившая верхушка Тассеры. Люди для них — одеяния. Пусть взглянет мне в глаза и поймет, каково быть раскроенным на куски". {n}Вы замечаете, что прижатое к телу жертвы оружие — не что иное, как искусно заточенные портняжные ножницы.{/n}

Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

languages.text: “别插手，外来者。该受惩罚的人不仅仅是他，整个塔瑟拉的贵族都烂到根上了。在他们眼里，普通人不过是用来穿戴的东西罢了。我要看着他的眼睛，让他亲自感受一下被人切成碎片的感觉。”{n}你意识到，袭击者手里的武器不是别的，正是一把磨砺得极其锋利的裁缝剪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别插手，外来者。该受惩罚的人不仅仅是他，整个塔瑟拉的贵族都烂到根上了。在他们眼里，普通人不过是用来穿戴的东西罢了。我要看着他的眼睛，让他亲自感受一下被人切成碎片的感觉。”{n}你意识到，袭击者手里的武器不是别的，正是一把磨砺得极其锋利的裁缝剪。{/n}

languages.text: 「口を出すなよ、よそ者。この男には罰を受ける資格がある。タッセーラの腐敗した上層部どもと一緒にな。奴らは人間を、ただの『着るもの』としか見ていないんだ。こいつに味わわせてやるさ。斬り刻まれる側の気持ちってやつをな」{n}あなたは気づいた。被害者の体に突きつけられているのは、見事に研ぎ澄まされた仕立屋用のハサミだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「口を出すなよ、よそ者。この男には罰を受ける資格がある。タッセーラの腐敗した上層部どもと一緒にな。奴らは人間を、ただの『着るもの』としか見ていないんだ。こいつに味わわせてやるさ。斬り刻まれる側の気持ちってやつをな」{n}あなたは気づいた。被害者の体に突きつけられているのは、見事に研ぎ澄まされた仕立屋用のハサミだった。{/n}

languages.text: «No se entrometa, {mf|forastero|forastera}. Este hombre merece ser castigado, junto con el resto de la podrida nobleza de Thassera. Ven al pueblo como simples adornos. Quiero que me mire a los ojos y descubra lo que se siente cuando te cortan en pedazos». {n}Te das cuenta de que el arma presionada contra el torso de la víctima son un par de tijeras de sastre afiladísimas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No se entrometa, {mf|forastero|forastera}. Este hombre merece ser castigado, junto con el resto de la podrida nobleza de Thassera. Ven al pueblo como simples adornos. Quiero que me mire a los ojos y descubra lo que se siente cuando te cortan en pedazos». {n}Te das cuenta de que el arma presionada contra el torso de la víctima son un par de tijeras de sastre afiladísimas.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen bu işe karışma yabancı. Bu adam da Thassera'nın kalan tüm yoz seçkinleri de cezalandırılmayı hak ediyor. İnsanlara paçavra muamelesi ediyorlar. Bırak da ellerimde parça pinçik olmak nasıl bir hismiş görsün." {n}Kurbanın karnına dayalı silahın ustalıkla bilenmiş bir terzi makası olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sen bu işe karışma yabancı. Bu adam da Thassera'nın kalan tüm yoz seçkinleri de cezalandırılmayı hak ediyor. İnsanlara paçavra muamelesi ediyorlar. Bırak da ellerimde parça pinçik olmak nasıl bir hismiş görsün." {n}Kurbanın karnına dayalı silahın ustalıkla bilenmiş bir terzi makası olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: « Ne vous mêlez pas de ça, {mf|étranger|étrangère}. Cet homme mérite d'être puni, comme tout le reste de l'élite dépravée de Thassera qui considère les gens comme de simples choses à porter. Laissez-moi le regarder dans les yeux pendant qu'il découvre ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on se fait découper. » {n}Vous réalisez que l'arme pressée contre le corps de la victime n'est rien d'autre qu'une paire de ciseaux de couture affûtés d'une main experte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not interfere, outsider. This man deserves to be punished, along with all of Thassera's rotten elite. They see people as just things to be worn. Let him look me in the eye and find out what it feels like to be cut to pieces." {n}You realise that the weapon pressed against the victim's body is none other than a pair of expertly sharpened tailor's scissors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous mêlez pas de ça, {mf|étranger|étrangère}. Cet homme mérite d'être puni, comme tout le reste de l'élite dépravée de Thassera qui considère les gens comme de simples choses à porter. Laissez-moi le regarder dans les yeux pendant qu'il découvre ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on se fait découper. » {n}Vous réalisez que l'arme pressée contre le corps de la victime n'est rien d'autre qu'une paire de ciseaux de couture affûtés d'une main experte.{/n}

languages.text: "Mischt Euch nicht ein, {mf|Fremder|Fremde}. Dieser Mann hat Strafe verdient, genau wie die gesamte verrottete Elite von Thassera. Menschen sind für sie nur Dinge, die man trägt. Er soll mir in die Augen sehen und erfahren, wie es sich anfühlt, in Stücke geschnitten zu werden." {n}Du siehst, dass die Waffe am Körper des Opfers nichts anderes ist als eine sorgsam geschärfte Schneiderschere.{/n}
